description:
Developers worldwide are embracing AI agents in software development with overwhelming enthusiasm, according to research from Salesforce. According to Salesforce’s latest State of IT survey, an impressive 96% of developers globally believe AI agents will positively reshape the developer experience, with more than nine in ten excited about AI’s impact on their careers. Closer to... Read more »

The post Developers are embracing AI agents for software development appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Developers are embracing AI agents for software development
